attributes.action: Create the Department of Government Efficiency
attributes.additional_details: To optimise the operations of public services in the UK, ensuring that tax revenue is spent as effectively as possible. By identifying and eliminating waste, streamlining processes, and enhancing coordination between agencies, the DGE could help reduce bureaucracy, shorten service delivery times, and save taxpayer money.
attributes.background: Create The Department of Government Efficiency (DGE) focused on optimising the operations of public services in the UK, ensuring that tax revenue is spent as effectively as possible and brings real benefits to British citizens.
